izzy.features.clip¶

izzy.features.clip(x, left=None, right=None, cut=False)[source]¶

Clips an array

If cut = False, this sets any values < left to left and values > right to right. If cut = True, then the values < left and values > right are removed.

Parameters

  • x (ArrayLike) – Array to clip

  • left (int or float) – Left boundary to clip or cut

  • right (scalar) – Right boundary to clip or cut

  • cut (bool) – Flag to determine if we should clip or cut

Returns

Clipped or cut array

Return type

ArrayLike
